block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS -- Activated RHP David Riske from the 60-day disabled list. Placed RHP Jamie Brown on the 60-day disabled list. Recalled LHP Tom Martin from Buffalo of the International League and INF John McDonald from Kingston of the Carolina League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS -- Activated OF Carlos Beltran and LHP Paul Spoljaric from the disabled list. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS -- Activated Vinny Castilla from 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Travis Harper and RHP Dan Wheeler from Durham of the International League.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS -- Activated RHP David Riske from the 60-day disabled list. Placed RHP Jamie Brown on the 60-day disabled list. Recalled LHP Tom Martin from Buffalo of the International League and INF John McDonald from Kingston of the Carolina League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS -- Activated OF Carlos Beltran and LHP Paul Spoljaric from the disabled list. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS -- Activated Vinny Castilla from 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Travis Harper and RHP Dan Wheeler from Durham of the International League.

National League FLORIDA MARLINS -- Recalled INF Chris Clapinski from Brevard County of the FSL. Recalled RHP Vladimir Nunez, RHP Joe Strong, and INF Nate Rolison from Calgary of the PCL. Purchased the contract of C Sandy Martinez from Calgary. Recalled INF Pablo Osuna from Portland of Eastern League. HOUSTON ASTROS -- Recalled RHP Scott Linebrink and purchased the contract of C Frank Charles from New Orleans of the PCL. NEW YORK METS -- Recalled LHP Bobby M. Jones and RHP Grant Roberts from Norfolk of the International League. Purchased the contract of INF Jorge Velandia from Norfolk. Designated INF David Lamb for assignment. SAN DIEGO PADRES -- Recalled RHP Tom Davey and LHP Dave Mauer from Las Vegas of the PCL.

Atlantic League NEWARK BEARS -- Signed 1B Marc Fink and C Josh Brinkley. Placed C Adam Capodieci and INF Sharnol Adriana on the inactive list. Placed 3B Craig Worthington on the 7-day disabled list retroactive to Aug. 31.
National Hockey League MONTREAL CANADIENS -- Signed D Sheldon Souray to a two-year contract.

National Football League GREEN BAY PACKERS -- Released TE Chris Eitzmann. NEW YORK JETS -- Waived TE Jake Moreland. Activated T John Elliott from the suspended list. WASHINGTON REDSKINS -- Signed RB Stephen Davis to a nine-year contract.
Major League Soccer METROSTARS -- Called up G Paul Grafer from Long Island of the A-League.

EVANSVILLE -- Named Bob Gallman interim athletic director. LAFAYETTE -- Named Keita Molloy assistant football coach for receivers. LEBANON VALLEY -- Named Candace Lebo assistant cross country coach. MANSFIELD -- Named Derek Furry women's assistant track and field coach. ST. MICHAEL'S -- Named Robyn Newton softball coach, Zach Kramer men's cross country coach, and Liz D'Elia assistant trainer.
